sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_34d514f347330110a06c690cd36d4376
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Mat√©riel informatique">0f7bafd0477a0110a06c690cd36d4330</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Access controls</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onLoad() {
   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
	
	var ga = new GlideAjax('RequestAsControls');

    ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getAnswers');

    ga.getXML(callback);

}

function callback(response) {

    var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
	
	answer = JSON.parse(answer);

    if (!answer.as_manager && !answer.as_team) {
        g_form.removeOption("type_of_request", "delegate_request");
    }
    if (!answer.as_direct) {
        g_form.removeOption("type_of_request", "exceptional_request");
    }
    if (!answer.as_operator) {
        g_form.removeOption("type_of_request", "specific_request");
    }
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-06-06 22:53:25</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>34d514f347330110a06c690cd36d4376</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Access controls</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_34d514f347330110a06c690cd36d4376</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-06-06 23:11:52</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
